page.title: 13SOCIAL CONCERNS cont'd.
page.content: {Centre 13}is a youth and community centre where daily activities cater for about 1200 old and young,sick and fit,mentally ill and handicapped , privileged and deprived,from a wide area each week.Centre 13 provides sport,drama,music,social contact to a wide range of people, supported by {Church}and fundraising to pay workers and bills. The{Balsall Heath Association}is an advice centre which deals with numerous problems.One of the main problems is{unemployment}and its hardships.In one area 60% of parents are unemployed,and 2/3 of the children receive free meals.Many older immigrants have difficulties in filling in forms as they cannot read English.The{BHA}help them to claim benefits,fill in tax forms,pay bills, and find employment.
